addProjectProposal(bytes32,address,uint2.details: Adds a project proposal to the vote

params.amountNeeded: Amount needed for the project  Maybe add a way to allow some projects to propose a proposal or not*

params.asset: The asset they are allowed to borrow Add permissions to this call, e.g. only the owner should be able to approve borrowers!*
params.borrower: The borrower of the funds (i.e. delgatee)

params.amount: The amount the borrower is allowed to borrow
params.asset: The asset they are allowed to borrow*

canBorrow(address).details: Checks the project is allowed to borrow an asset

params.asset: The asset they are allowed to borrow*

params.amount: The amount to be deposited as collateral
params.asset: The asset to be deposited as collateral
params.isPull: Whether to pull the funds from the caller, or use funds sent to this contract  User must have approved this contract to pull funds if `isPull` = true*

getProjectAllowance(address).details: Checks the project allowance in DAI

hasRightToVote(address).details: Checks whether sender can vote or not

params.sender: The address of the account to check*

params.asset: The asset to be repaid User calling this function must have approved this contract with an allowance to transfer the tokens You should keep internal accounting of borrowers, if your contract will have multiple borrowers*

updateProjectProposal(address,uint256).details: Updates a project porposal to the vote

params.amountNeeded: Amount needed for the project  Maybe add a way to allow some projects to propose a proposal or not*

params.projectAddress: The address of the project to vote for*

params.asset: The underlying asset to withdraw Add permissions to this call, e.g. only the owner should be able to withdraw the collateral!*

approveBorrower(address,address).notice: Approves the borrower to take an uncollaterised loan

depositCollateral(address,uint256,bool).notice: Deposits collateral into Aave, to enable credit delegation This would be called by the delegator.

withdrawCollateral(address).notice: Withdraw all of a collateral as the underlying asset, if no outstanding loans delegated
